domainSeparator().details: The domain separator is computed according to EIP-712 specification, using:      - The hardcoded name "EigenLayer"      - The contract's version string      - The current chain ID      - This contract's addressSee https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-712#definition-of-domainseparator.

returns._0: The 32-byte domain separator hash used in EIP-712 structured data signing.
The version string in SemVer format (e.g., "v1.1.1")

domainSeparator().notice: Computes the EIP-712 domain separator used for signature validation.

version().notice: Returns the semantic version string of the contract.
